scripts.watch: nodemon --exec 'sass --style=compressed src/consumer.scss dist/dev.css && yarn prettier --write dist/dev.css' --ext css,scss --watch src
scripts.build-css-dev: sass --style=compressed scripts/dev.scss dist/dev.css && yarn prettier --write dist/dev.css
scripts.build-css-dev-full: sass --style=compressed scripts/dev-full.scss dist/dev-full.css && yarn prettier --write dist/dev-full.css
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && yarn concurrently --raw 'yarn build-css-dev' 'yarn build-css-dev-full' 'yarn build-css-prod' 'yarn build-css-prod-full' 'yarn build-js' 'yarn build-browser-js'
